scripts.start: sam local invoke --profile shopint --region eu-central-1 -e event.json getSimilarProducts --env-vars env.json
scripts.package: sam package --template-file template.yaml --profile shopint --s3-bucket shopint-functions --output-template-file packaged.yaml
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --profile shopint --region eu-central-1 --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name getSimilarProducts --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.publish: npm run package && npm run deploy
